question_text_bm: Apakah doa yang dianjurkan selepas mengambil wudhu?
question_text_en: What is the recommended supplication after performing wudhu?

question_text_bm: Susun langkah-langkah rukun wudhu mengikut tertib yang betul.
question_text_en: Arrange the essential steps of wudhu in the correct order.

question_text_bm: Apakah hukum mandi wajib dalam Islam?
question_text_en: What is the ruling of performing ghusl (obligatory bath) in Islam?

question_text_bm: Manakah antara berikut adalah sebab yang mewajibkan mandi wajib?
question_text_en: Which of the following requires performing ghusl?

question_text_bm: Apakah niat yang betul sebelum mandi wajib?
question_text_en: What is the correct intention (niyyah) before performing ghusl?

question_text_bm: Bahagian manakah yang mesti diratakan air ketika mandi wajib?
question_text_en: Which parts of the body must be completely washed during ghusl?

question_text_bm: Apakah perkara sunat yang boleh dilakukan sebelum mandi wajib?
question_text_en: What are the recommended acts before performing ghusl?

question_text_bm: Bilakah masa yang paling afdhal untuk mandi wajib selepas haid atau nifas?
question_text_en: What is the best time to perform ghusl after menstruation or postnatal bleeding?

question_text_bm: Adakah wajib menggunakan sabun dan syampu ketika mandi wajib?
question_text_en: Is it obligatory to use soap and shampoo during ghusl?

question_text_bm: Apakah hukum bagi seseorang yang tidak mandi wajib setelah berjunub dan terus menunaikan solat?
question_text_en: What is the ruling for someone who does not perform ghusl after janabah (major impurity) and performs prayer?

question_text_bm: Apakah hikmah di sebalik mandi wajib dalam Islam?
question_text_en: What is the wisdom behind ghusl in Islam?

question_text_bm: Jika seseorang mandi wajib tetapi terlupa membasuh rambut, apakah yang perlu dilakukan?
question_text_en: If someone performs ghusl but forgets to wash their hair, what should they do?

question_text_bm: Tidak membaca niat sebelum mandi wajib menyebabkan mandi menjadi tidak sah.
question_text_en: Not making an intention before ghusl makes it invalid.

question_text_bm: Jika terdapat bahagian badan yang tidak terkena air, mandi wajib menjadi tidak sah.
question_text_en: If any part of the body remains dry, ghusl becomes invalid.

question_text_bm: Seseorang yang berhadas besar boleh membaca Al-Quran sebelum mandi wajib.
question_text_en: A person in a state of major impurity can recite the Quran before performing ghusl.

question_text_bm: Mandi wajib hanya perlu dilakukan selepas bersetubuh atau haid.
question_text_en: Ghusl is only required after sexual intercourse or menstruation.

question_text_bm: Susun langkah-langkah rukun mandi wajib dalam tertib yang betul.
question_text_en: Arrange the obligatory steps of ghusl in the correct order.

question_text_bm: Apakah bacaan yang wajib dibaca dalam setiap rakaat solat?
question_text_en: What is the obligatory recitation in every rak'ah of prayer?

question_text_bm: Apakah niat solat dalam Islam perlu dilafazkan secara lisan?
question_text_en: Is it necessary to verbalize the intention (niyyah) for prayer in Islam?

question_text_bm: Apakah yang boleh membatalkan solat seseorang?
question_text_en: Which of the following invalidates a person's prayer?

question_text_bm: Berapakah jumlah rakaat bagi solat fardu dalam sehari?
question_text_en: How many total rak'ahs (units) are there in the five daily prayers?

question_text_bm: Apakah hukum solat berjemaah bagi lelaki?
question_text_en: What is the ruling on performing congregational prayer for men?

question_text_bm: Apakah yang perlu dilakukan jika tertinggal satu rakaat dalam solat berjemaah?
question_text_en: What should be done if one misses a rak'ah in congregational prayer?

question_text_bm: Apakah bacaan yang disunatkan dalam rakaat kedua solat Subuh sebelum rukuk?
question_text_en: What is the recommended recitation in the second rak'ah of Fajr prayer before bowing (rukuk)?

question_text_bm: Apakah hukum meninggalkan solat dengan sengaja tanpa sebab?
question_text_en: What is the ruling for deliberately abandoning prayer without a valid reason?

question_text_bm: Apakah hikmah solat dalam kehidupan seorang Muslim?
question_text_en: What is the wisdom of prayer in a Muslim's life?

question_text_bm: Meninggalkan solat fardu dengan sengaja tanpa sebab adalah dosa besar.
question_text_en: Deliberately abandoning obligatory prayer without a valid reason is a major sin.

question_text_bm: Jika seseorang terlupa membaca tahiyat awal dalam solat, solatnya batal dan perlu diulang dari awal.
question_text_en: If someone forgets to recite the first tashahhud in prayer, their prayer is invalid and must be restarted.

question_text_bm: Sujud sahwi dilakukan jika terdapat kesilapan kecil dalam solat, seperti terlupa rukun sunat.
question_text_en: Sujud sahwi is performed when there is a minor mistake in prayer, such as forgetting a sunnah action.

question_text_bm: Lelaki wajib solat berjemaah di masjid dalam semua keadaan tanpa pengecualian.
question_text_en: Men are obligated to pray in congregation at the mosque in all situations without exception.

question_text_bm: Solat boleh dilakukan dalam keadaan duduk jika seseorang tidak mampu berdiri.
question_text_en: Prayer can be performed while sitting if a person is unable to stand.

question_text_bm: Susun rukun solat mengikut tertib yang betul.
question_text_en: Arrange the pillars of prayer in the correct order.

question_text_bm: Apakah solat sunat yang dilakukan apabila seseorang menghadapi kesukaran dan memohon pertolongan Allah?
question_text_en: What is the voluntary prayer performed when facing difficulty and seeking Allah's help?

question_text_bm: Apakah yang perlu dilakukan jika seseorang tertidur dan terlepas solat fardu?
question_text_en: What should be done if someone sleeps through and misses an obligatory prayer?

question_text_bm: Solat sunat boleh dilakukan pada bila-bila masa kecuali dalam waktu yang dilarang. Bila waktu larangan ini?
question_text_en: Voluntary prayers can be performed at any time except during forbidden times. When are these times?

question_text_bm: Apakah solat sunat yang dianjurkan dilakukan secara berjemaah di bulan Ramadan?
question_text_en: Which voluntary prayer is recommended to be performed in congregation during Ramadan?

question_text_bm: Apakah kelebihan melakukan solat sunat Tahajjud?
question_text_en: What is the benefit of performing the Tahajjud prayer?

question_text_bm: Bilakah waktu terbaik untuk menunaikan solat Dhuha?
question_text_en: When is the best time to perform Dhuha prayer?

question_text_bm: Berapakah jumlah rakaat minimum solat sunat Rawatib?
question_text_en: What is the minimum number of rak'ahs for Rawatib voluntary prayers?

question_text_bm: Apakah solat sunat yang dilakukan untuk memohon petunjuk daripada Allah sebelum membuat keputusan?
question_text_en: Which voluntary prayer is performed to seek guidance from Allah before making a decision?

question_text_bm: Jika seseorang tidak mampu menunaikan solat berdiri, apakah yang harus dilakukan?
question_text_en: If a person is unable to perform prayer while standing, what should they do?

question_text_bm: Manakah solat yang boleh dilakukan sebagai qada'?
question_text_en: Which prayer can be performed as qada' (make-up prayer)?

question_text_bm: Jika seseorang terlupa solat Witir selepas Isyak, dia boleh mengqada'nya sebelum Subuh.
question_text_en: If someone forgets to perform Witir after Isha, they can make it up before Fajr.

question_text_bm: Solat sunat Rawatib hanya boleh dilakukan selepas solat fardu, bukan sebelumnya.
question_text_en: Rawatib voluntary prayers can only be performed after obligatory prayers, not before.

question_text_bm: Solat sunat boleh dilakukan walaupun tanpa wudhu.
question_text_en: Voluntary prayers can be performed even without wudhu.

question_text_bm: Solat sunat Dhuha hanya boleh dilakukan sebelum Subuh.
question_text_en: Dhuha prayer can only be performed before Fajr.

question_text_bm: Solat sunat Tahajjud hanya boleh dilakukan selepas tidur.
question_text_en: Tahajjud prayer can only be performed after sleeping.

question_text_bm: Apakah syarat wajib berpuasa Ramadan?
question_text_en: What are the requirements for fasting in Ramadan?

question_text_bm: Apakah perkara yang boleh membatalkan puasa?
question_text_en: Which of the following invalidates the fast?

question_text_bm: Jika seseorang makan atau minum kerana terlupa, apakah hukumnya?
question_text_en: If someone eats or drinks by mistake while fasting, what is the ruling?

question_text_bm: Apakah keutamaan bersahur?
question_text_en: What is the significance of having suhoor?

question_text_bm: Apakah yang perlu dilakukan jika jatuh sakit dan tidak mampu berpuasa?
question_text_en: What should be done if someone falls ill and is unable to fast?

question_text_bm: Malam apakah yang lebih baik daripada 1000 bulan dan disambut dalam bulan Ramadan?
question_text_en: Which night in Ramadan is better than 1000 months?

question_text_bm: Apakah amalan sunat ketika berpuasa?
question_text_en: What are the recommended acts while fasting?

question_text_bm: Bagaimana cara menggantikan puasa bagi orang yang uzur seperti sakit kronik atau tua?
question_text_en: How should a person with a chronic illness or old age compensate for missed fasting?

question_text_bm: Apakah kelebihan berpuasa di bulan Ramadan?
question_text_en: What is the benefit of fasting in Ramadan?

question_text_bm: Niat berpuasa boleh dilakukan dalam hati tanpa perlu dilafazkan secara kuat.
question_text_en: The intention to fast can be made in the heart without being verbally expressed.

question_text_bm: Wanita yang sedang haid atau nifas tidak perlu berpuasa dan wajib menggantikannya selepas Ramadan.
question_text_en: Women who are menstruating or experiencing postpartum bleeding do not have to fast and must make up for it after Ramadan.

question_text_bm: Berkumur dan memasukkan air ke dalam hidung ketika berwudhu semasa berpuasa boleh membatalkan puasa.
question_text_en: Rinsing the mouth and putting water into the nose while performing wudhu during fasting can break the fast.

question_text_bm: Puasa boleh dibatalkan jika seseorang jatuh sakit dan tidak mampu meneruskannya.
question_text_en: Fasting can be broken if someone falls ill and is unable to continue.

question_text_bm: Malam Lailatul Qadar hanya berlaku pada 10 malam terakhir Ramadan.
question_text_en: The Night of Qadr (Lailatul Qadr) only occurs in the last 10 nights of Ramadan.

question_text_bm: Tidur sepanjang hari tanpa melakukan ibadah ketika berpuasa adalah amalan yang digalakkan.
question_text_en: Sleeping all day without engaging in worship while fasting is encouraged.
